longTitle: TCGA adrenocortical carcinoma (ACC) somatic mutation (bcm automated)
dataProducer: Baylor College of Medicine Human Genome Sequencing Center
label: somatic mutation SNPs and small INDELs (bcm automated)
name: TCGA_ACC_mutation_bcm
wrangling_procedure: Download .maf file from TCGA DCC, removed any calls from WGS samples, processed into UCSC Xena mutation format, stored in the UCSC Xena repository
gdata_tags: Baylor College of Medicine Human Genome Sequencing Center
description: TCGA adrenocortical carcinoma (ACC) somatic mutation data. Sequencing data are generated on a IlluminaGA system. The calls are generated at Baylor College of Medicine Human Genome Sequencing Center using the Baylor pipeline method.
